Key Match Events: Lane Thomas had four RBI and the Cleveland Guardians held on behind their bullpen to beat the Chicago White Sox 6-4 on Wednesday for a three-game series sweep.
A. Hedges homered to left (362 feet) in the 3rd inning.
W. Brennan grounded out to first, Thomas scored, Freeman to second in the 8th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Guardians swept the Chicago White Sox in a three-game series.
The game was played at Rate Field in Chicago, Illinois.
